m_displayName: EQUIPMENT - PIN - CHUCHOTEUR - Clone de Merlimon

description.fr:
{%attack} Si la cible est en {#TENAILLE} téléporte {Summoning:23387} à coté de la cible et déclenche son {%AT} sur la cible, puis le téléporte de {cell:t}.
\---
<rem>Limité à {value:limit} fois par tour.</rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} à {Summoning:23387}.
description.en:
{%attack} If the target is in {#TENAILLE}, teleports {Summoning:23387} alongside the target and triggers his {%AT} on the target then teleports him {cell:t}.
\---
<rem>Limit: {value:limit} {limit, plural, one[time] other[times]} per turn.</rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} to {Summoning:23387}.
description.es:
{%attack} Si el objetivo está {#TENAILLE}, teletransporta a {Summoning:23387} al lado del objetivo y activa su {%AT} en el objetivo, luego se teletransporta {cell:t}.
\---
<rem>Limitado a {value:limit} {limit, plural, one[vez] other[veces]} por turno.</rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} a {Summoning:23387}.
description.de:
{%attack} Wenn das Ziel in der {#TENAILLE} ist, teleportiert sich {Summoning:23387} neben das Ziel und löst seinen {%AT,plural:one} beim Ziel aus. Teleportiert sich dann um {cell:t}.
\---
<rem>Auf {value:limit}-mal pro Runde begrenzt.</rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} bei {Summoning:23387}.
description.pt:
{%attack} Se o alvo estiver {#TENAILLE}, teletransporta o {Summoning:23387} para o lado do alvo e aciona seu {%AT} sobre ele. Depois, se teletransporta por {cell:t}.
\---
</rem> Limite de {value:limit} {limit, plural, one[vez] other[vezes]} por turno.<rem>
\---
{%Death} {ATvalue:pc,percent,+} ao {Summoning:23387}.
